trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the **RowUpdating** event of a .NET Framework data provider.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för den **RowUpdating** händelsen för en .NET Framework-dataprovidern.

trans-unit.source: The `RowUpdating` event is typically raised just before an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to a row begins.
trans-unit.target: Den `RowUpdating` händelsen aktiveras normalt precis före en <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>till en rad börjar.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> is called.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> när <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>anropas.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The type of SQL statement to execute.
trans-unit.target: Typ av SQL-uttryck som ska köras.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> att skicka via <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> object for an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> objekt för en instans av den här klassen.

trans-unit.source: This method allows implementations to perform type checking for the <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> object assignment.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden kan implementeringar att utföra typkontroll för den <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>objekt tilldelningen.</xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: Only valid <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> objects, for example a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object, should be permitted.
trans-unit.target: Endast giltiga <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>objekt, till exempel en <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objekt, ska tillåtas.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> ska köras under <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> ska köras under den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>åtgärden.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> ska köras under <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets any errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> executes.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar alla fel som genereras av .NET Framework-dataprovidern när den <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>Kör.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: The errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> executes.
trans-unit.target: Fel som genereras av .NET Framework-dataprovidern när den <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>Kör.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> that will be sent to the server as part of an insert, update, or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> som skickas till servern som en del av en insert-, update- eller delete-åtgärden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to send through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> att skicka via <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of SQL statement to execute.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar typ av SQL-uttryck som ska köras.

trans-unit.source: StatementType can be one of the following values: - Select - Insert - Update - Delete
trans-unit.target: StatementType kan vara något av följande värden: - Välj - Insert - Update - Delete

trans-unit.source: The type of SQL statement to execute.
trans-unit.target: Typ av SQL-uttryck som ska köras.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> of the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"> </xref> av den <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"> </xref> värden.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Continue" name="Continue" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_Continue" name="Continue" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> att skicka via <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> att skicka via <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>
